message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $20,000. I think it would be a valuable asset to you.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $15,000 for it. Could we perhaps meet somewhere in between?
Bob, I understand your position, but $20,000 is already a very competitive price for this product. How about we meet in the middle at $17,500?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your response. I still feel that $15,000 would be a fair price for the product. Would you be able to meet us halfway?
